components.label: HTML
components.content: Please ensure your information below matches your identity verification form.

components.title: Read-only fields, used for BCSC create and edit mode or BCeID edit mode.
components.label: Panel

components.title: BCeID create mode when the user must provide all the data.
components.label: Panel
HTML
components.content:
How to update your information
Your information above is taken from your B.C. Services Card. If the information is incorrect, please update your information with B.C. Services Card first.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
You have a temporary Social Insurance Number
You may still create your account but your applications will not be processed until we verify your SIN information. Please refer here to prepare for the documentation required to submit and support your citizenship status'.
components.customConditional:
// If the SIN starts with a 9 it indicates a temporary SIN.
show = !!data.sinNumber && data.sinNumber.charAt(0) === "9";

components.label: HTML
components.content: Collection and Use of Information. The information included in this form is collected under ss. 26(c) and 26(e) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 165. Upon pressing the Submit button you are confirming that you have reviewed this statement. The information you provide will be used in confirming your identity. If you have any questions about the collection and use of this information, contact the Executive Director, StudentAid BC, Ministry of Advanced Education and Skills Training, PO Box 9173, Stn Prov Govt, Victoria BC, V8W 9H7, telephone 1-800-561-1818 (toll-free in Canada/U.S.) or +1-778-309-4621 from outside North America.
